mapper.select: SELECT b.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID tspStdItemId, b.TSP_STD_ITEM_NAME tspStdItemName, a.TSP_OK_VAL okVal, a.TSP_NG_VAL ngVal FROM pd_tsp_std a INNER JOIN pd_tsp_std_item b ON a.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID = b.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID AND a.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} AND b.PARENT_ID= #{filterMap.parentId}
SELECT b.TSP_STD_ITEM_ID tspStdClaId, b.TSP_STD_ITEM_NAME tspStdClaName FROM pd_tsp_std_item b WHERE b.LEVEL_ID = #{filterMap.levelId}
SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM pd_standard AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
